title: The Asset Allocator: A Guide To Reality (Podcast)
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Seeking Alpha contributor Jim Sloan’s article, “’A Little Ice Age’ Is Upon Us,” is the guide investors need to the reality of our new era. This podcast (8:15) concurs with Sloan that there is a future in stock-market investing, but investors need to take a different approach to decision making. Investing has returned to becoming a long-term proposition, where due diligence matters, where top-line growth without corporate window-dressing returns to its former importance.
